name: Q-YO Blaster (itch)
description:
• Characters by class
  • Weapons and Perks
  • Super Special Powers
  • Variety of enemies and confrontations against great bosses
  • 8 stages with animated backgrounds and high detail
  • Adjustable difficulty in the stages
  • CRT filter

Yep, is a horizontal Shoot 'Em Up , with peculiar characters, strange enemies, bullets, many bullets and many explosions. Enter the miniature world and stop the threat.

Enjoy the rudeness with weapons, special powers and help from mystical beings.

Using CRT filter

100% compatible with controller

Q-YO Blaster has a nice 2d environment with detailed pixel art stages, varied enemies section, stages, playable characters, pow. upgrades, powers, improvements and many more

Stage 3 - Using a Special Pow.
